scripts.install-graphics: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libgtk2.0-0 libgconf-2-4 libasound2 libxtst6 libxss1 libnss3 xvfb && npm install segmentio/nightmare
scripts.start-unix: Xvfb -ac -screen scrn 1280x2000x24 :9.0 & export DISPLAY=:9.0 && node nightmare-server.js
scripts.start: Xvfb -ac -screen scrn 1280x2000x24 :9.0 & export DISPLAY=:9.0 && node nightmare-server.js
